thread.title: Shilpa Shetty Shows Some Serious Skin In This Backless Gown
thread.title_full: Shilpa Shetty Shows Some Serious Skin In This Backless Gown

author: Sanaa Shah
title: Shilpa Shetty Shows Some Serious Skin In This Backless Gown
text:
A post shared by Shilpa Shetty Kundra (@officialshilpashetty) on Mar 20, 2017 at 10:35pm PDT 
Shilpa Shetty Kundra was in Goa for an event looking like a retro diva. Celebrity stylist and friend Surily Goe l styled her for this event in a floor-length dress. It was a draped gown in nude and black, having a super low back detailed with a fringe on the side. A post shared by SurilyG (@surilyg) on Mar 20, 2017 at 10:40pm PDT 
With her hair styled in a retro updo by celebrity hairstylist Amit Thakur , she opted for an understated glam look with smokey eyes and pink nude lips. A post shared by Shilpa Shetty Kundra (@officialshilpashetty) on Mar 20, 2017 at 10:43pm PDT 
She accessorised her look with diamond earrings, a box clutch and the Bulgari serpentine watch in silver which complemented this look perfectly. 
We think she looked absolutely stunning showing off her super toned sexy back. What do you think? Let us know by commenting below. 6 TAGS
